tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE AccessControlLists (
    acl_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    table_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    access_level VARCHAR(10),
    permission VARCHAR(20),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE AccessControlLists (
    ACLID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    PolicyID INT,
    UserID INT,
    AccessLevel VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (PolicyID) REFERENCES SecurityPolicies(PolicyID)
);
